forest_clearing.name: Forest Clearing
forest_clearing.description: A peaceful clearing in a dense forest. Sunlight filters through the leaves, and a stone table stands before you.

manor.name: Manor
manor.description: A small manor with a large garden. The air is warm and the sun shines brightly.

foyer.name: Foyer
foyer.description: A cozy foyer with a large table and chair. There is a large glass door to the east.

dark_cave_entrance.name: Dark Cave Entrance
dark_cave_entrance.description: The air grows cold as you stand at the mouth of a dark, damp cave.

goblins_lair.name: Goblin's Lair
goblins_lair.description: A small, squalid cave reeking of unwashed goblin. Bones litter the floor.

dungeon_cell_1.name: Goblin Dungeon - Cell 1
dungeon_cell_1.description: A cramped stone cell with rusted bars. Scratches mark the walls.

dungeon_cell_2.name: Goblin Dungeon - Cell 2
dungeon_cell_2.description: The damp air smells of mold. You hear faint chittering ahead.

dungeon_cell_3.name: Goblin Dungeon - Cell 3
dungeon_cell_3.description: Bones crunch underfoot. Shapes flit just out of sight.

dungeon_cell_4.name: Goblin Dungeon - Cell 4
dungeon_cell_4.description: Water drips from the ceiling into a shallow, murky puddle.

dungeon_cell_5.name: Goblin Dungeon - Cell 5
dungeon_cell_5.description: A wider chamber lit by a guttering torch. Something watches you.

shack_shop.name: Shack Shop
shack_shop.description: A small, cozy shack with a large table and chair. There is a large glass door to the east.

village_square.name: Village Square
village_square.description: A quaint village square with a stone well and a few benches. Villagers pass by, chatting quietly.

params.npc_description: leans on a walking stick, ready to chat.
